original_text: Solomon also built a house for himself to live in. It was in a yard behind the Hall of Justice. It was like the other buildings. He also built a house like it for his wife who was the king of Egypt's daughter.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 거처할 왕궁은 그 주랑 뒤 다른 뜰에 있으니 그 양식이 동일하며 솔로몬이 또 그가 장가 든 바로의 딸을 위하여 집을 지었는데 이 주랑과 같더라

sentences.original_text: Solomon also built a house for himself
It was in a yard behind the Hall of Justice
It was like the other buildings
He also built a house like it
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 그와 같은 집을 지었습니다

sentences.original_text: who was the king of Egypt's daughter
